component.name: Meazure
component.summary: Meazure is a tool for easily measuring and capturing portions of the screen

description.p: Tasks such as measuring the size of a window, capturing an image, determining the color of a pixel, and determining the screen size can all be easily accomplished. Meazure provides a number of different tools for measuring and capturing the screen. In addition, tool positions can be recorded to a file for future playback.
